about_the_game:
Bite Size Terrors:

Are Short Experimental Horror Experiences each with their own Unique Genres and Styles.
From the Creator of Notebook Entries, this is...

Speechless:

  • A Story Focusing on Show not Tell.
  • No dialogue. No Voices. Discover the story as you play and explore.
  • Enrich yourself in a colorful, yet destroyed world.
  • Soundtrack gets added depth/Sounds with each achievement in-game.
  • Use limited bullets & your instincts to survive.

Story:

There is another world that connects with ours, the biggest difference is.... It doesn't hide it's monsters,
Not knowing how long you've waited, Today is the day.
Prepared, you venture into the other world, confronting the creatures that await you.
As you get deeper & deeper, you start to understand that sometimes...we don't hide our monsters either.
We embrace them.

Gameplay:

A Survival Horror focusing on limited bullets, guns & ways to defend yourself.
Find your way around this world, finding New Objectives, Key Items & Weapons.
Minimalistic gameplay with an emphasis on atmosphere when arriving in a new environment.
